title: The Beach is Fun! - 2
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>You’ve got a pretty good sense of style, Karin.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Hmhm, have you fallen for my charms?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>N-no, I wouldn’t go that far.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Well, I’ve been captivated by you, Yoshiko-chan. That’s a cute swimsuit you’ve got on.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Huh, really!? Everyone picked this one out for me when we went shopping.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I’m sure they all understood your charm, Yoshiko-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Ehehe... Wait a minute. Karin! It’s not Yoshiko, it’s Yohane! It seems you’ve forgotten!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Yeah, yeah. Alright then, Yohane-chan, let me put some sunscreen on you. Getting a sunburn on your back would hurt a lot.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Oh, you’re right. Please do... ah! Ahahaha! Hey! Karin! That tickles-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Sorry, sorry~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
